text: Today is a lesson with everyone, right?
Yeah, everyone should start gathering up soon.

── It's nice that training camps like this
give us plenty of useful time, huh.
... as long as those two aren't dragging me around, that is.

Haha.
Asahi and Mei are full of motivation so I'm sure it'll be fine.

Don't talk about it like it's someone else's problem.
It'll trouble me if you don't take responsibility and watch them.

S-Sorry...
I'll make sure I keep an eye on them.

Seriously... you better be up to it.
I'm counting on you, you know.
── Fuyu is going to be too focused.
